name: MyBirthdays
0:
”Alexa, start my birthdays”
”When was Tom Black born”
”Who's birthday is next”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my birthdays
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to the skill My Birthdays by Oredein.

In order to use this skill you have to follow the instructions:

1. enable and start the skill: "Alexa, start my birthdays"
2. A 6-digit authentication code will be provided via Alexa App.
3. In order to add new birthdays you have to log in via your 6-digit code: https://www.oredein.com/alexa/bday/. Furthermore you can state a name which is used by Alexa in order to call you.
4. After your log in you can start adding some birthdays.
5. Just click "send" if you want to finish editing.
6. Go back to the skill and ask for the recently added birthdays. (Say:"Alexa, when is Tobis birthday")

You can also ask Alexa for the upcoming birthday:
"Alexa, when is the next birthday"

In case you forgot your 6 digit code:
"Alexa, help"

Important:
Do not deactivate the skill if you already added a bunch of birhtdays. Otherwise all your data will be lost
after re-activating.

Enjoy the skill:
If you have any questions please contact tobi@oredein.com.

Hint:
The logo used was created by
PixelBuddah (www.flaticon.com)
